ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name != "System Administrator", !ISBLANK(Date_Sent_to_External_System__c), ISCHANGED(Payment_Status__c), AND( TEXT(Payment_Status__c) != "Payment Sent", TEXT(Payment_Status__c) != "Payment Acknowledged", TEXT(Payment_Status__c) != "Payment Released", TEXT(Payment_Status__c) != "Payment Confirmed", TEXT(Payment_Status__c) != "Void/Cancelled" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The payment has already been sent to the external system. You cannot change the payment back to a previous status. Please contact your administrator.
